sentences.sContent: The government had also incurred huge debts.
sentences.sCn: 政府也已承受了大笔债务。

sentences.sContent: ...or concerned about the additional expenses teleworking policies might incur as staff start charging their home phone bills to the business...

remMethod.val: in(进入) ＋ cur(发生) → 使发生 → 招致； 遭受

trans.tranCn: 招致， 引起； 遭受
trans.tranOther: if you incur a cost, debt, or a fine, you have to pay money because of something you have done
